mapper.sql: GOODS_ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_PIC, DATA_CREATE_TIME, DATA_EDIT_TIME, TYPE_ID, STATUS, SHOP_ID, GOODS_MEMO
mapper.select:
select "GOODS".*, "TYPE".TYPE_NAME AS typeName, "SHOP".SHOP_NAME AS shopName from XINGYING_SHOP.GOODS left join XINGYING_SHOP.TYPE on "GOODS".TYPE_ID = "TYPE".TYPE_ID left join XINGYING_SHOP.SHOP on "GOODS".SHOP_ID = "SHOP".SHOP_ID
GOODS.STATUS = '1'
AND "GOODS".GOODS_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{goodsName}),'%')
AND "SHOP".SHOP_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{shopName}),'%')
AND "TYPE".TYPE_ID = #{typeId}
AND "GOODS".SHOP_ID = #{shopId}
AND NOT EXISTS(select GOODS_ID from XINGYING_SHOP.HOT_GOODS where "HOT_GOODS".GOODS_ID = "GOODS".GOODS_ID)

select "GOODS".*, "TYPE".TYPE_NAME AS typeName from XINGYING_SHOP.GOODS left join XINGYING_SHOP.TYPE on "GOODS".TYPE_ID = "TYPE".TYPE_ID
GOODS.STATUS = '1'
AND "GOODS".SHOP_ID = #{shopId}
ORDER BY "GOODS".DATA_CREATE_TIME DESC
